attributes.action: place a finanical levy on disposable plastic bags issued free in retail outlets in order to encourage recycling of plastic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hundreds of thousands of disposable plastic bags are issued free by retail outlets across the UK. To encourage recycling of these plastic bags a charge should be placed say 10pence per bag, if palstic bags are taken by customers. In the Irish Republic a charge of approx' 15c is put on each bag taken/brought from retail outlets.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
